entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
